channel.title: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Live Action Webseries launch Teaser
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
Can't wait for the release of BM: Source, until that I release a teaser for my upcoming live action webseries Half-Life: Chain Reaction I hope you will enjoy !
Ben
[b][url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ALYRvfA4Gz0&feature=share&list=UUjb8EmxGlMmeBEwWYvSW8bw']Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Teaser[/url][/b][/SIZE] [img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-d-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-snc6/256037_430105727025327_1529081506_o.jpg[/img]

item.title: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Live Action Webseries launch Teaser
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description:
It will be done for the begining of December and centered around the character of Chief instructor Miller, from the security forces of Black Mesa.

I have to say I don’t have any kind of budget for my project so I hope I will not disappoint you !

Ben

item.description:
